OF COUNSEL

Tom F. Young, Jr.
Emily Hornsby*
*also licensed in Georgia
August 6, 2024
EMAIL ONLY: matt@agricolalaw.com
Mr. Matt Holdren
Agricola Law
127 South 8th Street
Opelika, AL 36801
RE: McGregor v Gilliland
Case No.: 70-DR-2023-900051.01
Dear Matt:
Per our telephone conversation, you were going to provide me with the name of
the reunification specialist and the cost of any counseling pursuant to Item # 3 of the
proposed order. We also need to address the issue as required in item # 2, due to the
fact that we both discovered that the Child Advocacy Center will not counsel with your
client. It may become necessary for our clients to jointly agree on another counselor so
that a joint session between A.K. and Ms. Gilliland can take place. And last, as
discussed, there is no insurance that covers counseling within the health insurance
policy presently held by my client. That will be another matter that we need to discuss
briefly to determine how the cost of counselling will be covered. In item # 6, do you think
it may be a good idea to be less specific about Wednesday night so that conflicts in our
client’s schedule and A.K.’s schedule will not prevent said weekly dinners.
I look forward to talking to you about these matters as soon as possible.
Sincerely,
TOM F. YOUNG, JR.
TFY/cc
